$.jui.juiScrollPane.name: $.jui.juiScrollPane
$.jui.juiScrollPane.description:
Makes a content area scrollable with custom
scrollbars whose elements are fetched or created depending on the
flags passed in/or-not-passed in by the user.
$.jui.juiScrollPane.author: ElyDeLaCruz
todo: move event listeners out of the create function (for consistency)
use the listeners added to window and contentHolder in the unbind function (to ensure we don't remove anyone elses listeners)

$.jui.juiScrollableDropdown.name: $.jui.juiScrollableDropdown
$.jui.juiScrollableDropdown.description:
Created by ElyDeLaCruz on 10/1/13.
A scrollable drop down.

jQuery.jui.juiBase.name: jQuery.jui.juiBase
jQuery.jui.juiBase.description:
Created with JetBrains WebStorm.
User: ElyDeLaCruz
Date: 9/1/13
Time: 4:27 AM
jQuery.jui.juiBase.extends: jQuery.Widget - JQuery Ui Widget Factory Constructor.
todo:
-- issue solved -- make sure all classes that need a timeline object
implement their own `getTimeline` method.
~~~deprecated~~~
Resolve issue with non-unique timeline object -
Timeline object seems to be only one instance not new instances on
new calls of the extending plugins.
start using $.each instead of Object.keys (gets rid of one more dependancy)

jquery.juiSelectPicker.name: jquery.juiSelectPicker
jquery.juiSelectPicker.description:
Created by ElyDeLaCruz on 10/1/13.

Hides a Select Element and Replaces it with a scrollable Select Picker element
which is fully stylable.
todo: convert all inline option docs to options doclet using the @ property tag

classitems.description: Animation options.

Sets flag if touch device (used for disable plugin if options.disableOnTouchDevice
is true).

Destroys `this` instance.

Reverses the animation timeline if not touch device.

classitems.description: Class name added to wrapper element.
Animation options.
Label text.
Selected Value Label Prefix.

Skip the first option from the select element in rendering to wrapper.
Selected Value.

Ui Hash.

Sets flag if touch device (used for disable plugin if options.disableOnTouchDevice
is true).
Draws select element's options into wrapper.

Makes wrapper's content scrollable.
- Calls jui.scrollableDropDown on wrapper;

classitems.name: destroy
refreshOptions

classitems.description: Sets the select picker's `selected item label`.

params.name: text
params.description: value to set to label; default ''

params.name: textType
params.description: (html|text) (proxy jquery's text() and/or html() methods to set text).  Default 'text'

params.name: usePrefixAndSuffix
params.description: Whether to use prefix and suffix for label text. Default false

classitems.name: setSelectedItemLabelText

classitems.description: Sets the select picker's label.

params.name: text
params.description: value to set on label;

params.name: textType
params.description: proxy key for jquery for setting text. Default 'text'

classitems.name: setLabelText

classitems.description:
Sets the selected element in the wrapper's drawn options.
- Triggers a change event on this.element (select element);

params.name: elm
params.description: The actual element that should be selected.

classitems.name: setSelected

classitems.description: Clears the currently selected element.
classitems.name: clearSelected

classitems.description: Plays animation timeline (if disableOnTouchDevice is true and isTouchDevice, does nothing).
classitems.name: playAnimation

classitems.description: Reverses the animation timeline if not touch device.
classitems.name: reverseAnimation

classitems.description: Gets a drawn option element (from within wrapper) by value.
classitems.name: getOptionElementByValue

classitems.description: Gets the selected option's value (from within wrapper).
Options hash.
Used internally as a hash of possible states.
Used internally to keep track of text state.
The event's prefix name used when triggering event [complete,toggle]
Splits a string to a string of span elements.
Creates/Instantiates our plugin.

Toggles the elements split text state (between original text
and split text to spans text).

params.name: state
params.description: optional default null

classitems.description: Returns the original text of the element.
Options hash.

Takes a namespace string and fetches that location out from
an object.  If the namespace doesn't exists it is created then
returned.
Example: _namespace('hello.world.how.are.you.doing') will
create/fetch:
hello: { world: { how: { are: { you: { doing: {} } } } } }

params.name: ns_string
params.description: the namespace you wish to fetch

params.name: extendObj
params.description: optional, default this.options

params.name: valueToSet
params.description: optional, a value to set on the key (last key if key string (a.b.c.d = value))

classitems.description: Populates this.ui with element collections from this.options.

params.name: config
params.description: optional, default this.options

classitems.description: Fetches an element from the option hash's `ui` namespace.

return.description: null or the jquery element selection

classitems.description:
Create and Element from the options.ui hash and appends it to
it's config.appendTo section alias string.

params.name: config
params.description:
the options object from which to create
 and where to populate the created element to.

classitems.description: Remove created elements from the options.ui hash plugin.

Pulls a ui element from the options -> ui hash else uses
getElementFromOptions to create/fetch it.
Sets css on element if it exist.

params.name: alias
params.description: Element alias

classitems.description:
Lazy initializes a Timeline Lite or
Timeline Max animation timeline.
Adds animations to our animation timeline.

params.name: timeline
params.description: optional

params.name: animations
params.description: optional animations array

params.name: options
params.description: {object] optional options hash to search on

classitems.description:
Gets an option value from the options hash.  This function is a
proxy for `getValueFromHash` and it just sets the hash to `this.options`.

Searches hash for key and returns it's value.  If value is a function
calls function, with optional `args`, and returns it's return value.
If `raw` is true returns the actual function if value is a function.

params.name: key
params.description: The hash key to search for

params.name: hash
params.description: optional, the hash to search within

params.name: args
params.description: optional the arrays to pass to value if it is a function

params.name: raw
params.description: optional whether to return value even if it is a function

classitems.description:
Returns the timeline classname to use for the instance of the plugin
extending juibase.
